snippet.title: "BUNNY GARDEN" Trailer ENG
snippet.description:
This is a dating sim adventure game that takes place in a gentlemen's haven called "Bunny Garden". At "Bunny Garden", you can enjoy drinking with the adorable staff, and develop relationships. Forget about your daily stress and enjoy to your heart's content. Your choices will shape the narrative. The fate of your relationships rests solely in your hands.

■CAST■
・Kana       (Voice : Mio Hoshitani）
・Rin          (Voice : Eri Suzuki）
・Miuka    (Voice : Masumi Tazawa）

■STAFF■
・Character Design:Waon Inui
・Scenario:Takayoshi Muto（Synthese）
・Producer:Yujiro Usuda

■SPEC■
・Game Title:BUNNY GARDEN
・Release Date:【Nintendo Switch】April 18, 2024
　　　　　　　【STEAM】Spring, 2024
・Platform:STEAM, Nintendo Switch
・Genre:Dating sim adventure
・Price:$22.99
・Supported Number of Players:1
・Supported Text Languages:Japanese, English, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese
・Voice Language:Japanese

X (Twitter) for the latest information!
https://twitter.com/qureate

©2024 qureate
